svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - September 7 2018
title: "September 7, 2018" date: "2018-09-07"

Live on mainnet
• Connext’s first payment channel hub (Spankchain) is live on mainnet
Connext’s first payment channel hub (Spankchain) is live on mainnet
• Spankchain also began the process of releasing its stablecoin BOOTY, which is heavily collateralized
by its native token . You stake SPANK to get BOOTY . (links should be safe for work)
Spankchain also began the process of releasing its stablecoin BOOTY, which is heavily collateralized
• Zinc launches ERC725 identities on mainnet
Zinc launches ERC725 identities on mainnet
• Bounties Network explorer is live (and get your BRLN coin at ETHBerlin)
Bounties Network explorer is live (and get your BRLN coin at ETHBerlin)
• 0x v2 deployed to mainnet
0x v2 deployed to mainnet
• Dether is live , so you can trade ETH locally in 120 countries
Dether is live , so you can trade ETH locally in 120 countries
• DDA goes live with 1 week long & short tokens available on ETH/USD (5X multiplier) and BTC/USD (1X
multiplier
DDA goes live with 1 week long & short tokens available on ETH/USD (5X multiplier) and BTC/USD (1X
• BZx margin trading protocol launches on mainnet , Bamboo Relay should have margin trading live on
Monday
BZx margin trading protocol launches on mainnet , Bamboo Relay should have margin trading live on

response and Vitalik Buterin ’s.

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re interested.
I own Week In Ethereum. As such, editorial control has always been 100% me. If you’re unhappy with
editorial decisions, feel free to tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
